about_the_game:
Shadows of Betrayal is a visual novel about a group of teenagers, who after graduating from high school go on a trip to a remote cabin. The game is set in current day but with 80s/90s horror vibes.

Get to know the intriguing friend group, enjoy the banter, plot twists and optional romance, and try to survive the unexpected events in Shadows of Betrayal! Will you survive, and at what cost?

How will it all unravel? Play and find out.

Features


  • Interesting story with unexpected plot twists
  • Well written characters with engaging and witty dialogue
  • Meaningful choices
  • Relationship system that gives you feedback of what people think of your actions
  • First person narrative

short_description: Dive into Shadows of Betrayal, a horror/thriller visual novel about recent high school graduates, who head to a remote cabin for a celebration of sorts. Navigate friendships, delve into (optional) romance, and brace for suspenseful twists. Can you survive the unexpected, and what will it cost you?
